model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
You job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Speaker B, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes" or "No"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: When is your first music concert this summer?
Speaker B: I went to a concert on the fourth of July. It was great. What sort of art museum are you going to?
Speaker A: The museum has all sorts of galleries.  It has a sculpture garden outside.  I mostly like the impressionist paintings.  I like Van Gogh.  Was your concert outdoors?
Speaker B: Yes. That way they could have a fireworks show too. I love fireworks. Have you ever seen the fireworks at the Disney castle?
Speaker A: No, but I have been to Disney World in Florida.  I love fireworks too.  I want to get married on the 4th of July.  That was we will have a national holiday and fireworks for us every year!  It sounds like you've been to Disneyland?
Speaker B: No, but I thought you might have since you lived in LA for awhile. Did you get to see any live Disney music performances while you were at Disney World?
Speaker A: No, we rode a lot of rides that broke down.  We had to be rescued from the Pirates of the Caribbean ride.  It was stuck.  Someone put on waders and pushed us to the side to climb out.
Speaker B: Oh no! Hopefully your trip to the art museum is much better than that. Did your boyfriend go to Disney World too?
Speaker A: No, I had a cousin that I went with.  We stayed in a hotel in Miami too and I got so sunburned on the beach!  I'm sure the art museum will be good if it isn't too crowded.  Was your concert crowded?

MEMORY:
Speaker B was born in Brazil, specifically in San Paulo. - (Reason) - Speaker B recommends visiting the Museum of Art of São Paulo in the city. - (React) - Speaker A is planning to visit the Museum of Art of São Paulo next week with their boyfriend.
Speaker B drove over 1000 miles to see their favorite band, Three Dog Night. - (SameTopic) - Speaker A enjoys going to museums and trying different foods. - (Changed) - Speaker A plans to do lots of shopping during their trip.
Speaker A loves Disney music. - (SameTopic) - Speaker B enjoys living in the city for the accessibility to food and live music. - (Changed) - Speaker A's boyfriend enjoys drinking, so they are looking for good bars or clubs to enjoy the night.

raw_prediction: Yes, it was pretty crowded, but the energy was amazing. Do you and your boyfriend enjoy going to concerts together?

OUTPUT

The MEMORY contains information that could relate to the current conversation.
